httpMethod.description: Specifies an update integration response request's HTTP method.

patchOperations.description: A list of update operations to be applied to the specified resource and in the order specified in this list.

resourceId.description: Specifies an update integration response request's resource identifier.

restApiId.description: Specifies an update integration response request's API identifier.

statusCode.description: Specifies an update integration response request's status code.
